A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is nothing but a cash cow for Disney. Real Star Wars movies used to have a soul. This one  is just a soulless CGI porn mixed with bad acting and zillions of plot holes. Rey is a Jedi master with abilities she gained out of thin air with no training at all. Kylo is a kid with a mask as Snoke stated in the movie. Snoke is a villain with zero background who dies in the most possible ridiculous way.  Luke Skywalker is no longer Luke Skywalker! He is just there to give the impression that this is a Star Wars movie.\n\nAnyways\, the last real Star Wars movie was filmed by George Lucas. This new series is just a bad copy of the original.
